content:
/poll Should we keep Main, Master or both in our repos? Note that technically they both work; it's just that maintaining 2 branches is maybe not a good idea.
Master (We should have one "main" branch - and the CI build still uses Master as the main one).
Main (There can be only one, and one eventually the tools will catch up to this change).
Both (people may still be using any, we don't want them to choose and we don't mind the extra suffering and tool changes)
Don't really care
Really don't care
...
Are there still issues with "main" and the autobuild?
I thought the ci build is first triggered by a commit to master
(too good actually. I could easily make it build from either master or main, and today i learned that this can bring some pain)
